Item.name: Screwdriver
Item.description: Standard issue tool for Electrical Engineers.

Item.name: Pliers
Item.description: Standard issue tool for Electrical Engineers.

Item.name: Utility Knife
Item.description: Standard issue tool for storage workers.

Item.name: Claw Hammer
Item.description: Standard issue tool for construction workers.

Item.name: Hacksaw
Item.description: Standard issue tool for construction workers.

Item.name: Wrench
Item.description: Standard issue tool for Mechanics.

Item.name: Crowbar
Item.description: A small crowbar used to force open doors in emergencies.

Item.name: Frying Pan
Item.description: Standard issue cooking implement for Culinary Specialists.

Item.name: Sulphurite Tank
Item.description: A tank with liquefied compressed Sulphurite gas. This gas is not toxic but its denser than oxygen so displaces it when released.

Item.name: Hydrogen Tank
Item.description: A tank with compressed hydrogen gas, which is used as fuel.

Item.name: Thermite Tank
Item.description: A tank with compressed thermite gas, which is used as welding fuel.

Item.name: Welding Tool
Item.description: One of the most crucial tools on board any submarine. Also works underwater.

RequiredItems.name: Thermite Tank,Sulphurite Tank,Hydrogen Tank,Oxygen Tank,Oxygenite Tank,Oxygen Bottle

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Tall Door,Wide Hatch,Thin Door,Thin Windowed Door,Thin Hatch,Wall Door,Wall Hatch,Thick Door

Item.name: Saw Cutter
Item.description: Cuts through various materials using a circular blade. It works on batteries.

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Alien Door,Alien Hatch

Item.name: Plasma Cutter
Item.description: Cuts through various materials using a jet of ionized gas.

RequiredItems.name: Oxygen Tank,Oxygenite Tank,Hydrogen Tank,Sulphurite Tank,Thermite Tank,Oxygen Bottle

StatusEffect.targetnames: Door,Blast Door,Windowed Door,Glass Door,Glass Hatch,Hatch,Blast Hatch,Duct Block,Alien Door,Alien Hatch,Tall Door,Wide Hatch,Thin Door,Thin Windowed Door,Thin Hatch,Wall Door,Wall Hatch,Thick Door

Item.name: Fire Extinguisher
Item.description: A handheld carbon dioxide extinguisher. A must in every submarine.

Item.name: Battery Cell
Item.description: Used as a power source for various handheld devices. Most submarines have several stationary backup batteries with recharge docks for battery cells.

Item.name: Fulgurium Battery Cell
Item.description: A battery cell constructed of the rare and poorly understood compound Fulgurium.

Item.name: Handheld Sonar
Item.description: A personal sonar device used by divers to explore underwater areas or find their way back to the submarine.

Item.name: Flashlight
Item.description: A portable hand-held electric light source.

Item.name: Flare Red
Item.description: Flares are used mostly for signalling but also as emergency illumination.

Item.name: Flare Green
Item.description: Flares are used mostly for signalling but also as emergency illumination.

Item.description: Flares are used mostly for signalling but also as emergency illumination.
